argumentText:
ARGUMENT
m

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-clintop | |- clIntOp = ( m e. _V |-> ( m intOp m ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_a1i | |- ( M e. V -> clIntOp = ( m e. _V |-> ( m intOp m ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_id | |- ( m = M -> m = M ) |
| 4 | 3, 3 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( m = M -> ( m intOp m ) = ( M intOp M ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_intopval | |- ( ( M e. V /\ M e. V ) -> ( M intOp M ) = ( M ^m ( M X. M ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_anidms | |- ( M e. V -> ( M intOp M ) = ( M ^m ( M X. M ) ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_sylan9eqr | |- ( ( M e. V /\ m = M ) -> ( m intOp m ) = ( M ^m ( M X. M ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_elex | |- ( M e. V -> M e. _V ) |
| 9 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( M ^m ( M X. M ) ) e. _V |
| 10 | 9 | #P_a1i | |- ( M e. V -> ( M ^m ( M X. M ) ) e. _V ) |
| 11 | 2, 7, 8, 10 | #P_fvmptd | |- ( M e. V -> ( clIntOp ` M ) = ( M ^m ( M X. M ) ) ) |
